original_text: When they came up out of the water, the Spirit of the Lord suddenly took Philip away, and the eunuch did not see him again, but went on his way rejoicing.
korean_text: 둘이 물에서 올라올새 주의 영이 빌립을 이끌어간지라 내시는 기쁘게 길을 가므로 그를 다시 보지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: When they came up out of the water
Spirit of the Lord suddenly took Philip away
and the eunuch did not see him again
but went on his way rejoicing
